Closes the underlying ServerSocket, making this object unusable for later.

Closes the underlying ServerSocket, making this object unusable for later.
close() - Method in class manager.ConnectionsManager
Closes all connections, therefore terminating their corresponding MessagesManager, as well as the Listener provided in the constructor, thus terminating this Thread.

constraint - package constraint
 
Constraint - Class in constraint
Abstract class for constraints that define the rules for the Broker to accept or reject a MessagePublish from clients.

Manages all the MessagePublish constraints for the Broker.

Interface for ServerSockets that are able to accept connections.

loadFromFile() - Method in class constraint.ConstraintsManager
Calls loadFromFile(InputStream) with the FileInputStream of the file ConstraintsManager.DEFAULT_FILE.
loadFromFile(InputStream) - Method in class constraint.ConstraintsManager
Reads the constraints configuration from the provided InputStream and creates the appropriate Constraints, which will be later used when calling checkConstraints(MessagePublish,String).

R

run() - Method in class manager.ConnectionsManager
Entry point for a ConnectionsManager Thread, accepts new connections with the provided Listener and spawns a MessagesManager for each of them.

The entry point for this MessagesManager Thread.
